name: hadoop.http.idle_timeout.ms
description: NN/JN/DN Server connection timeout in milliseconds.

name: dfs.namenode.name.cache.threshold
description:
Frequently accessed files that are accessed more times than this
    threshold are cached in the FSDirectory nameCache.

name: dfs.disk.balancer.plan.threshold.percent
description:
The percentage threshold value for volume Data Density in a plan.
      If the absolute value of volume Data Density which is out of
      threshold value in a node, it means that the volumes corresponding to
      the disks should do the balancing in the plan. The default value is 10.

name: dfs.ha.tail-edits.namenode-retries
description: Number of retries to use when contacting the namenode when tailing the log.

name: mapreduce.map.maxattempts
description:
Expert: The maximum number of attempts per map task.
  In other words, framework will try to execute a map task these many number
  of times before giving up on it.

name: dfs.client.deadnode.detection.probe.deadnode.interval.ms
description: Interval time in milliseconds for probing dead node behavior.

name: dfs.client.failover.connection.retries.on.timeouts
description:
Expert only. The number of retry attempts a failover IPC client
    will make on socket timeout when establishing a server connection.

name: ipc.[port_number].decay-scheduler.metrics.top.user.count
description:
The number of top (i.e., heaviest) users to emit metric
    information about. This property applies to DecayRpcScheduler.
